title: [GAMEPLAY] [PBE]  Morgana's Black Shield not blocking CC from Special Delivery
body: Using Morgana's Black Shield on her self did not block the CC found in Corki's Special Delivery as described in the ability.  The shield had no apparent effect and it was intact at the time.

replies.body: There is a pbe forum for this
Post it there please. Because of preseaons, we have a whole lot of people sweeping PBE bug forum, your post have way more visibility there.
When is the preseason discussion post number 4 going to happen?
